text: Sphingomonas rubra is a Gram-negative, rod-shaped, neutrophilic and motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from wastewater from a leather plant in China.UniProtDeutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas rubra at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase rubra Category:Bacteria described in 2011
title: Sphingomonas rubra
